Message:
Ever since Master sacrificed
his life to save mine,

I continue to live
without aging a day.

To bring him back,
I’ve even sullied my
hands in forbidden arts.

But the only thing
I’ve learned is that
one cannot overturn
God’s laws on life.

but the reason
I wish otherwise is...

It appears that the
demons are once again
attempting to return.

This life was entrusted to me,
and now is the time to use it.

...Oh dear, a frightening
thought just crossed my mind.

Demons can rise up
against God Himself.
My life is a gift from Master.

It’s only natural that
I protect the world
that he loved so much.

For that is the final role
I am meant to play.
